Solution would be to check if the root control of navigator is already disposed before starting the update in updateSelectionJob:

in the org.eclipse.ui.internal.navigator.actions.LinkEditorAction, line 90:

instead of:

if(!newSelection.isEmpty()) {
    commonNavigator.selectReveal(newSelection);
}

should be:

if(!newSelection.isEmpty() 
   && !commonNavigator.getCommonViewer().getControl().isDisposed()) {
    commonNavigator.selectReveal(newSelection);
}

I hope it is possible to quickly fix this now.

Please notice, that this bug is NOT a dup from bug 191779, which is related to not working *selection linking*.
